data.title: Fixed units stopping when making them move while they are already moving.
data.body: This fixes an annoying issue where units stop for a moment if you give them an order to move to the same place they are moving to.

data.title: Selectable bounds/selection box refactor
data.body:
- Introduced `VisualBounds` in `SelectionDecorations`, these are responsible for the visible selection box now (independent from actual selectable area)
- Moved `SelectionDecorations` and `SelectionBoxRenderable` to Mods.Common.
- selection boxes and selection bars can now be enabled/disabled individually, selection box color is now configurable.
- Set tighter `Selectable.Bounds` for many actors, to dramatically reduce issues where it was difficult to click on a cell or actor hidden behind another actor's selectable area.
- Removed `Selectable` boolean from `Selectable` trait.

This should pretty much fix #5552 and #3871 for the shipping mods. TS buildings will need isometric bounds to fix this completely.

data.title: Create only one scratch vertex buffer for rendering
data.body: Previously several buffers were created but only one was ever used.

data.title: OpenRA won't start
data.body:
When I try to start OpenRA it happens nothing. I just can see "OpenRA.exe" and "OpenRA.Game.exe" in the Task-Manager but it happens nothing.
I'm using the OpenRA release-20150424.

data.title: Add the "Mentat" prefix to the messages in atreides01a
data.body: Fixes #8376.

data.title: Jittery game play
data.body:
I get jittery game play after I've been playing for a while. I'm on Ubuntu-MATE 15.04.
video demo https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WGkGbKDsIeQ
The issue happens even in the latest version.

I don't get this in the Windows version.

data.title: Download and install the required dependencies for freetype6
data.body: Add Visual C 2010 SP1 ...

data.title: Check also for 2012 and 2013 Visual C runtimes libaries
data.body: freetype6.dll is accepting also 2012 and 2013 revisions of the Visual C runtimes.

data.title: Selectable boolean on Selectable trait is confusing
data.body: We should either try to remove it, or rename it and add a description to make it more clear why and for what it is needed.

data.title: Less permissive color validator
data.body:
Enforces larger difference to terrain color and higher minimum lumination.

Closes #7902.

data.title: Include MSVC++ 2012 or higher in the dependencies check
data.body:
since we have the check for MSVC++ 2010 it is unable to compile openra... i have installed VS 2013 =(
which installs Visual C++ runtimes 2012 and freetype6 compiled also fine with this... =(

now it fails with every Version =(

data.title: D2K turret build animations are missing.
Map Editor/OpenRa fails to open mission map.

Was doing some tweaking to map terrain and then save and exit editor and now i'm unable to play it and when i try to open it via Map Editor i get this error. 

No idea what went wrong. Also i have no idea how github works ): . SOS.

To enable just-in-time (JIT) debugging, the .config file for this
application or computer (machine.config) must have the
jitDebugging value set in the system.windows.forms section.
The application must also be compiled with debugging
enabled.

For example:

<configuration>

</configuration>

When JIT debugging is enabled, any unhandled exception
will be sent to the JIT debugger registered on the computer
rather than be handled by this dialog box.

data.title: D2K: Prefix in-game mission hints.
data.body: For example, "Build a refinery to collect spice." should be  "Mentat: Build a refinery to collect spice." as it was in the original. The idea is that the mentat is supposed to be helping you out.

data.body:
And most of the time crates are bonuses ! :)

data.title: The death sound of the artillery and V2 is their firing sound
data.body:
I don't know if it's intended or not but when you destroy an artillery or a V2 your hear its firing sound, not a sound played when you destroy a vehicle.
## <bountysource-plugin>

Want to back this issue? **[Post a bounty on it!](https://www.bountysource.com/issues/19809959-the-death-sound-of-the-artillery-and-v2-is-their-firing-sound?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github)** We accept bounties via [Bountysource](https://www.bountysource.com/?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github).
</bountysource-plugin>

data.title: Get into a waiting line when joining a server
data.body:
would avoid Cancel -> Double-click on the server -> Cancel -> Double-click on the server to see if a slot has been opened by the admin or not. :)
With some messages like "Waiting for slot..." or "Sorry, the game has started".
## <bountysource-plugin>

Want to back this issue? **[Post a bounty on it!](https://www.bountysource.com/issues/19809962-get-into-a-waiting-line-when-joining-a-server?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github)** We accept bounties via [Bountysource](https://www.bountysource.com/?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github).
</bountysource-plugin>

data.title: Nukes and supply trucks on earnings graph ?
data.body:
When a player throws a nuke or receives supply trucks he earns exceptional money, but the earnings graph shows only "undefined" peaks. It would be interesting to see graphically that "this peak because of this player's nuke" and "this one because of that player's n supply trucks".
## <bountysource-plugin>

Want to back this issue? **[Post a bounty on it!](https://www.bountysource.com/issues/19809944-nukes-and-supply-trucks-on-earnings-graph?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github)** We accept bounties via [Bountysource](https://www.bountysource.com/?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github).
</bountysource-plugin>

data.title: Sortable statistics
data.body:
It would be useful to be able to sort the statistics in order to see what is the ranking of a specific player in a specific situation and at a specific moment.
## <bountysource-plugin>

Want to back this issue? **[Post a bounty on it!](https://www.bountysource.com/issues/19809939-sortable-statistics?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github)** We accept bounties via [Bountysource](https://www.bountysource.com/?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github).
</bountysource-plugin>

data.title: Complete earnings graph
data.body: Is it possible to show the complete earnings graph in the statistics in order to see the complete evolution of a player during the game ? Actually we can see only the last minutes.

data.title: Custom orders/scripts
data.body:
It would be useful to be able to set some custom orders, like "Undeploy" -> MoveTo -> Deploy, when you select one of your construction yards, press one (user-defined) key and right click to some location.
And it could be enhanced like "Label" -> MoveToNextAdjacentCell -> ShootInRange -> "Goto Label" when you select some units, press another (user-defined) key and right-click on a location on the map.

data.title: Badgers collision
data.body: I am not a fan of this idea but the collision between two badgers could lead to their crash ?

data.title: Check for dependencies of dependencies
data.body:
This adds a check for MS VC++ 2010 in `make dependencies` and issues a warning if it is not installed.

Closes #8180.
Can be extended to check for implicit dependencies of other DLLs that we fetch.
